short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restores the old roblox server list & allows searching of users through their username

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT!! READ:

Roblox has updated their API which has officially broken this extension and most (if not all) other extension which search for people. As far as I know, there is no fix to this. The extension will be unlisted and there will not be anymore updates unless Roblox undoes this change. It was a fun ride while it lasted. ðŸ˜¥

Fast server & user searcher to bring back the old roblox server list
(User searching may false positive with default avatars)

Support Server:
https://discord.gg/aYK8jmmcrJ
Firefox Version:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/restore-old-roblox-server-list
